name: @compliance-theater/fetch
description: Fetch utilities with configurable behavior for the Title IX Victim Advocacy Platform

scripts.build:publish: yarn workspace @compliance-theater/fetch run build && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/fetch pack --out ./dist/@compliance-theater-fetch.tgz
scripts.build:typescript: echo 'Building lib/fetch typescript...' && tsc -b tsconfig.json && printf '\u001b[1;32mBuild complete: @compliance-theater/fetch.\u001b[0m\n' || (printf '\u001b[31mBuild failed: @compliance-theater/fetch.\u001b[0m\n' >&2; exit 1)
